DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to characterize the chemical breakdown and excretion of talampanel and its break down products in plasma, feces, and urine of healthy human volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion of Talampanel
